      • arcadeDrive

        public void arcadeDrive(double moveValue,
               double rotateValue)
        Drive the robot, arcade drive style
        Parameters:
        moveValue - Forward/back motion. +1 is full forwards, -1 is full reverse
        rotateValue - Rotation. -1 is left, +1 is right

      • cheesyDrive

        public void cheesyDrive(double throttle,
               double wheel,
               boolean quickTurn)
        Drive the robot with the Cheesy Drive algorithm
        Parameters:
        throttle - Forward/back motion. +1 is full forwards, -1 is full reverse
        wheel - Rotation. -1 is left, +1 is right
        quickTurn - If quick turn mode should be used
